scripts.build-style: node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/ src/scss/nextzen.scss; mkdir -p dist/images;cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* dist/images/; cp -r node_modules/leaflet-geocoder-mapzen/dist/images/* dist/images/
scripts.build-standalone-style: node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/ src/scss/nextzen.standalone.scss; mkdir -p dist/images; cp -r node_modules/mapzen-scarab/src/images/* dist/images/; cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* dist/images/; cp -r node_modules/leaflet-geocoder-mapzen/dist/images/* dist/images/
scripts.build-dev-style: node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/ src/scss/nextzen.css -w; cp -R node_modules/mapzen-scarab/src/images dist/images; cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* dist/images/;
scripts.build-standalone: browserify -t [browserify-shim --global] ./src/js/nextzen.js --standalone Mapzen > dist/nextzen.standalone.js && browserify -t [browserify-shim --global] -t uglifyify ./src/js/nextzen.js --standalone  Mapzen | uglifyjs -c comparisons=false -m > dist/nextzen.standalone.min.js && npm run-script build-standalone-style
scripts.build: browserify ./src/js/nextzen.js > dist/nextzen.js && browserify -t uglifyify ./src/js/nextzen.js | uglifyjs -c comparisons=false -m > dist/nextzen.min.js && npm run-script build-style
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build-standalone; npm run build
